EmailTemplate.name: 2018-02-02 DXC Executive Partnership Update.2-2-2018 Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 02.2.2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Below please find our weekly Executive Partnership Update. This weekly summary is sent every Friday to update stakeholders on progress across the partnership. We had a strong finish to the month, which also marks the end of Turbonomic’s FY 2018. We are looking forward to kicking off our FY 2019 building on the significant momentum seen to date. Any questions or comments, please reach out. Thanks,
Greg
